20101230080602.000|20101230080604.000|CC1|CENTER BANS FOE TAUPES IN THE   
20101230080604.000|20101230080605.000|CC1|DELIVERY ROOM UNTIL FIVE MINUTES
20101230080605.000|20101230080606.000|CC1|AFTER THE BABY IS BORN.

20101230080608.000|20101230080610.000|CC1|NOT ABOUT COVERING THEMSELVES IN
20101230080610.000|20101230080611.000|CC1|LAWSUITS, BUT SAYS IT WILL      
20101230080611.000|20101230080614.000|CC1|QUOTE, PROTECT PATIENT PRIVACY
